name: resolveFromAccount(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the user account that provides the funds for paying the bill.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveFromAccount(for intent: INPayBillIntent, 
                            with completion: @escaping (INPaymentAccountResolutionResult) -> Void)
